summary: This interview covered the candidate's technical background in full-stack development, with emphasis on React, TypeScript, and backend technologies. The candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving skills through their real-time analytics dashboard project, showing expertise in performance optimization and scalable architecture. They showed genuine interest in the role through thoughtful questions about team structure and professional development.

questions.question: Can you walk me through a challenging project you worked on recently?
questions.answer: Led development of a real-time analytics dashboard for e-commerce platform, focusing on handling massive data volume while keeping UI responsive using React with WebSocket connections.

questions.question: How did you handle the performance optimization for the real-time updates?
questions.answer: Used React.memo and useMemo to prevent unnecessary re-renders, batched updates over 100ms intervals, optimized database queries and added Redis caching.

questions.question: What technologies do you prefer to work with?
questions.answer: Frontend: React and TypeScript. Backend: Node.js, Python, and Go. Cloud: AWS and Docker for deployment.

questions.question: Do you have any questions about the role or our company culture?
questions.answer: Asked about team structure, code review processes, technical decision-making, and professional development opportunities.
